item.title: PI Titles for the mode you choose
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Thanks, that fixed 2 of the errors, got 1 more :\

source\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:2036: cannot find symbo l symbol : variable characterTitle location: class server.model.players.Client c.characterTitle = 2; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: PI Titles for the mode you choose

item.title: PI Titles for the mode you choose
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Follow conventions when naming.

The compiler is seeing this:

c.character - c.title = 2.

You should name it characterTitle instead, the - is used as an arithmetic operator and is being read as such in your source code, which is why you have those errors.

Read full topic
item.source: PI Titles for the mode you choose

item.title: PI Titles for the mode you choose
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

I edited it in clickingbuttons.java, the errors are,

source\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:2036: cannot find symbo l symbol : variable character location: class server.model.players.Client c.character-title = 2; ^ source\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:2036: cannot find symbo l symbol : variable title location: class server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons c.character-title = 2; ^ source\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:2036: unexpected type required: variable found : value c.character-title = 2; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: PI Titles for the mode you choose
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Title says it all, i’m looking too add titles too the mode you pick, already added the modes into the server and the titles,

I was trying too add it into this code but was getting errors,

if (c.dialogueAction == 850) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastButton > 600) { c.easyMode = true; c.character-title = 2; c.finishedTut = true; c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis(); } }

Help appreciated, thanks.

Read full topic
